Name: ELECTRONIC STOCK TRADING SYSTEM
About the game: This Stock Trading Simulator is the most comprehensive trading system created. The ease and flow of the game are so uncomplicated that anyone can play this simulation. The game is highly recommended for the novice trader as well as the more seasoned traders. This is the nearest to the real thing of trading stocks ever created as a simulation. Buy and sell over 65 different stocks in 10 sectors when you fell fit. Containing all financial data released throughout the financial monthly calendar. Mirroring the actual economic data released in the real world. Interest Rate change made by the Federal Reserve, Unemployment Rate changes, and the rest of the financial calendar are incorporated for maximum consequence. Included are special events for individual stocks that fire randomly over time. New products and innovation that cause individual stocks to move are combined in the mix to move stocks. Donâ€™t forget the bad stuff. Restructuring and product flops can be part of the fun too. Events of non economic repercussion are also incorporated. Earthquake, Hurricane, Tornado, and whatever else might have an influence on the stock market are included in this game. Reserve Bank policy and Government policy have their events and rightful place in the game. When the President speaks the markets listen. All these and more are in play every day in this game. Here is the complete list of daily economic data covered in the game: WEEK 1 DAY 1 MANUFACTURERS INDEX AUTO SALES TRUCK SALES DAY 2 FOMC MINUTES FACTORY ORDERS DAY 3 MORTGAGE INDEX TRADE BALANCE SERVICE MANAGERS INDEX CRUDE INVENTORIES NATURAL GAS INVENTORIES DAY 4 JOB CUTS EMPLOYMENT CHANGE INITIAL CLAIMS CONTINUING CLAIMS DAY 5 NONFARM PAYROLLS UNEMPLOYMENT RATE HOURLY EARNINGS AVERAGE WORKWEEK CONSUMER CREDIT WEEK 2 DAY 1 WHOLESALE INVENTORIES DAY 2 MORTGAGE INDEX EXPORT PRICES IMPORT PRICES DAY 3 CRUDE INVENTORIES NATURAL GAS INVENTORIES BEIGE BOOK TREASURY BUDGET DAY 4 JOB CUTS EMPLOYMENT CHANGE INITIAL CLAIMS CONTINUING CLAIMS PPI DAY 5 EMPIRE MANUFACTURING RETAIL SALES CPI CAPACITY UTILIZATION INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION BUSINESS INVENTORIES BUSINESS SENTIMENT WEEK 3 DAY 1 INTEREST RATE DECISION FED GOVERNORS REPORT CURRENT ACCOUNTS BALANCE DAY 2 HOUSING MARKET INDEX BUILDING PERMITS HOUSING STARTS MORTGAGE INDEX HOUSING PRICE INDEX EXISTING HOME SALES DAY 3 NEW HOME SALES CRUDE INVENTORIES NATURAL GAS INVENTORIES DAY 4 JOB CUTS EMPLOYMENT CHANGE INITIAL CLAIMS CONTINUING CLAIMS LEI DAY 5 DURABLE GOODS ORDERS BUSINESS SENTIMENT WEEK 4 DAY 1 GDP DAY 2 21 CITY INDEX CONSUMER CONFIDENCE DAY 3 MORTGAGE INDEX PERSONAL INCOME PERSONAL SPENDING PCE CRUDE INVENTORIES NATURAL GAS INVENTORIES DAY 4 JOB CUTS EMPLOYMENT CHANGE INITIAL CLAIMS CONTINUING CLAIMS PENDING HOME SALES DAY 5 CONSTRUCTION SPENDING
